text: I was in Aztec West working at about
3:00 p.m. when I had a call that said I
was booked on a nine o'clock flight to
Thailand so did you have any idea of
what you might be facing the answer is
expect me unexpected
just took us through the moment because
we've seen a bit of it on video of when
you appeared to surface and you appeared
to found them it's been mentioned by
some members of the press that it was
luck I would say that was absolutely not
the case
our procedure is in this situation we're
swimming along an underwater passage
wherever there is airspace we surface we
shout and also we smell and in this case
we smelt the children before we actually
saw them what sort of chances did you
give this operation of success well
given the volume of water we'd seen come
out of that cave in the last in the
preceding couple of days it was
unbelievable that we'd found them and
that they are all healthy and I think we
we were both earth Rick and I were aware
of the enormity of the task
what sort of problems were you were you
facing the visibility in the water is
very very low so varying depth down to a
few inches there was also a lot of
debris in the cave from previous
attempts wire electrical cable pumps
tubing all sorts of things the cold also
was an issue some of the children were
quite small so we were quite concerned
about the how well the smaller children
would would hold up in terms of the the
journey out through the water what
struck me about that photo is that some
of the kids were smiling big smiles at
that point they were quite pleased and
we spent a fair bit of time up there
really trying to boost their morale
before we left because we didn't have
any food to give them we had lights to
give them and when you had to leave them
to go make your plans and so on how
confident were you of seeing them alive
again I made the promise that I'd come
back and we did in fact we came back
with food runs so completely confident
but having said that I live in a cave
and alive outside of a cave are two very
different things looking the pictures in
that famous pinch point
very narrow bit there in that absolutely
sent a shiver down my spine thinking of
squeezing through that most of the
diagrams that have been put out on on
the media are are not correct
there were a number of there were a
number of different points where
different techniques were required to
navigate both one person or one person
carrying a child so sometimes if it was
very low you had to carry them to the
side sometimes it was very narrow you
would push them in front what do you do
but man your arm what did you swim with
them how did you get them out we were
fortunate enough to have some local Thai
boys from a swimming club which we took
to a swimming pool and we we practiced
beforehand we essentially strapped a
cylinder to the front of the child they
had a full face mask which is a way of
making sure that they can breathe and
essentially they we had a handle on the
on the back of the child so you always
need to transport someone face down so
that any water runs away from their face
and we're able to maneuver them in that
way although they were still clipped to
us so that if we lost them in the
visibility we would always be able to
find them immediately so you push them
through almost like a wheelbarrow if you
want a picture it was probably more like
a shopping bag that sometimes you would
hold close to your chest
if the passage was narrow and deep if
the passage was low and wide you would
hold them out to the side
essentially maneuver them around
whatever obstacles were in the way
you're not a panic are you I'm not a
panic oh no what gave you that idea
yes so calm is unbelievable although of
course there have been that awful moment
when the the Navy SEAL who went down is
his life was lost oh I'd like to extend
my condolences to Salmons family and his
relatives again it's a shame because
with the rescue being so successful that
kind of adds a bittersweet flavor
yes it was a tragedy but people were
genuinely concerned it wasn't just the
media I mean there were people who were
willing those kids and you to get get
out we nor the media I can tell you the
world was there who knows what willing
you on and but you're back now but then
you went back to work it immediately
work yesterday no rest for the wicked
and I've seen some pictures of you back
at Cubs you're a leader there that's
right yes how long as yeah and what's a
reception did the children give them I
think they were they were very pleased
to see me last night it was it was nice
to see nice to see them and they it was
great to be back can you see that what
you did was fairly remarkable I can see
it was the first house that John we're
all pleased thank you so much great
pleasure to meet you thank you
